articles.author: Ben Winck
articles.title: The US has now regained all the jobs it lost in the pandemic
articles.description: The US added 528,000 jobs in July, bringing the national total to 152,536,000 payrolls. That's a new record high and just above pre-pandemic levels.
articles.content:
After 29 months of economic recovery, the US has recouped every job lost during the coronavirus recession.
The US added 528,000 nonfarm payrolls in July, marking the largest one-month gain since Feb… [+3072 chars]
